pageContent: Objectives: To systematically review erectile function (EF) outcomes following primary whole gland (WG) and focal ablative therapies for localized prostate cancer to ascertain whether the treatment modality or intended treatment volume affects the time taken to recover baseline EF.

metaData.source:
Men's sexual help-seeking and care needs after radical prostatectomy or other non-hormonal, active prostate cancer treatments
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32978635/
